body_html:
This might be a problem with your CUDA installation. All these constants should be defined (in your case) in /opt/cuda-8.0/include/cublas_api.h which is included by tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_blas.cc.

If grep CUBLAS_GEMM_ALGO5 /opt/cuda-8.0/include/cublas_api.h does not work for you, then it would appear to be a problem with your CUDA library installation. Does it?
body_text:
This might be a problem with your CUDA installation. All these constants should be defined (in your case) in /opt/cuda-8.0/include/cublas_api.h which is included by tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_blas.cc.
If grep CUBLAS_GEMM_ALGO5 /opt/cuda-8.0/include/cublas_api.h does not work for you, then it would appear to be a problem with your CUDA library installation. Does it?
body:
This might be a problem with your CUDA installation. All these constants should be defined (in your case) in `/opt/cuda-8.0/include/cublas_api.h` which is included by `tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_blas.cc`.

If `grep CUBLAS_GEMM_ALGO5 /opt/cuda-8.0/include/cublas_api.h` does not work for you, then it would appear to be a problem with your CUDA library installation. Does it?
